organization.fullName: Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution "Izmerov Research Institute of Occupational Health"

identificationModule.briefTitle: Thermoregulatory Reactions of Medical Workers Who Use Personal Protective Equipment From Biological Hazards
identificationModule.officialTitle: Study of Thermoregulatory Reactions of the Body of Medical Workers Who Use Personal Protective Equipment From Biological Hazards

responsibleParty.investigatorTitle: Head of the Laboratory of Personal Protective Equipment and Industrial Exoskeletons
responsibleParty.investigatorAffiliation: Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution "Izmerov Research Institute of Occupational Health"

leadSponsor.name: Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution "Izmerov Research Institute of Occupational Health"

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This research will provide data on thermal condition, functional status and working conditions of medical workers who use personal protective equipment from biological hazards. Acquired data will be used to define acceptable period of use for these protective costumes.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: This research will recruit 14-20 volunteers. During 8 hours each subject will perform their work using protective costume. Heart rate, electrocardiogram, oxygenation, skin and air temperature under costume and hygrometric data will be registered. Also there will be questionnaires for volunteers for subjective assessment of thermal and moisture sensations and assessment of working conditions.

keywords: Personal protective equipment from biological hazards

armGroups.label: Health workers

interventions.name: Personal protective equipment from biological hazard
interventions.description: Includes: isolation clothing, mask, eyewear, overshoes

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* healthy individuals (based on medical screening)

Exclusion Criteria:

* endocrinological diseases and disorders
* health deviations at the time of the study
